ComicInfo.Penciller: Andrew MacLean,Erik Larsen,Frank Fosco,Andrew MacLean,Frank Fosco,Erik Larsen
ComicInfo.Summary: Stripped of his lightning powers, Malcolm Dragon finds that he can no longer rely on the one thing that kept him alive! Now he faces his most fearsome challenge yet—at a time when he’s at his most vulnerable. Malcolm Dragon fights the Deadly Damsels of the Vicious Circle! Raptor! Vein! Samurai! Insect! Tigress! Volcanic! Climax! Double-Paige!
ComicInfo.Writer: Erik Larsen,Gary Carlson,Jim Gibbons,Jim Gibbons,Gary Carlson,Erik Larsen
ComicInfo.Title: Orphean Trek; Home Alone!
